channel.title: Legious | Birth of Legends
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www5.picturepush.com/photo/a/12569483/640/12569483.png[/img] [b]Welcome to [i]Legious[/i], a project that will be based upon the 474 graphical era of RuneScape. There will be a lot of unique traits about this new world, while also preserving the core game that you once knew. This will be the birth of a new server and many legendary players.[/b][/center]
[hr]
[b]Goals: [/b]
[ul][li]Complete 474 data package; this includes maps, objects, items and monsters[/li] [li]Content loaded game-play matching everything during the 474 graphical era[/li] [li]Stable and fast core to allow smooth and enjoyable game-play[/li] [li]Community built world, including a professional staff team[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[b]Update Log:[/b] If you are interested in seeing the progress of Legious, please look at the information in the code below. Each date will provide information below that describes what was done that day. [code] April 1, 2013: - Started the Legious project; a certain client and server source has been chosen and prepared for development. - Started designing the new skill system; a lot of skills are already done, but are being converted/improved to fit the new system's needs. [/code]
[b]Media:[/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/2aed7b4d65887801e9e0963263e62a00.png?1364861565[/img]
[b]This thread may seem a bit dull, but I promise it will be loaded with information within the next few days! I appreciate any support and future developers I might work with. Also, if you would like to know more about the Legious development team or you are interested in becoming a part of it, please go [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,631620.0.html]here[/url].[/b]

item.title: Legious | Birth of Legends
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:11, topic:513291”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=631538.msg4293032#msg4293032 date=1367689548]
Any updates?
[/quote]
Unfortunately, no. As much as I’d like to work on this project, I’ve been somewhat doubtful about the success of it. I’ve been extremely busy the past few weeks, due to work and school.[/quote]
At least you have your priorities in check. Good luck with school/work, and hopefully we can see some minor updates in the future.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Flame_:

Any updates?

Unfortunately, no. As much as I’d like to work on this project, I’ve been somewhat doubtful about the success of it. I’ve been extremely busy the past few weeks, due to work and school.

Read full topic

item.title: Legious | Birth of Legends
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:8, topic:513291”]I’ll give you your needed bump.
I’m assuming that you are implementing unique content. If you need any ideas send me or ox random xi a PM. I’d be glad to help out and I’m sure oxxi will too.
Good luck, and I like that banner.[/quote]
Thank you. I haven’t gotten much progress the past few days due to work and testing, so I just thought I should get on and check out the thread and all.

Read full topic

item.title: Legious | Birth of Legends
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Feerox:

What is the point of a 474 With old runescape back?

Your question is quite biased, mainly because that questions the entire reasoning behind RS2 emulation. Also, I don’t believe “old runescape” is loading 474 data, because the Godwars dungeon was not released during August.

Also, if you are interested in joining our development team or you just want to check out our thread, please go here.

Read full topic

item.title: Legious | Birth of Legends
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[center]
Welcome to Legious, a project that will be based upon the 474 graphical era of RuneScape. There will be a lot of unique traits about this new world, while also preserving the core game that you once knew. This will be the birth of a new server and many legendary players.[/center]

[hr]

Goals:

[ul][li]Complete 474 data package; this includes maps, objects, items and monsters[/li]
[li]Content loaded game-play matching everything during the 474 graphical era[/li]
[li]Stable and fast core to allow smooth and enjoyable game-play[/li]
[li]Community built world, including a professional staff team[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Update Log:
If you are interested in seeing the progress of Legious, please look at the information in the code below. Each date will provide information below that describes what was done that day.

April 1, 2013:
- Started the Legious project; a certain client and server source has been chosen and prepared for development.
- Started designing the new skill system; a lot of skills are already done, but are being converted/improved to fit the new system's needs.

Media:

2aed7b4d65887801e9e0963263e62a00.png?1364861565765×505

This thread may seem a bit dull, but I promise it will be loaded with information within the next few days! I appreciate any support and future developers I might work with. Also, if you would like to know more about the Legious development team or you are interested in becoming a part of it, please go here.

Read full topic
